reauth_confirm.description: The Splunk token is no longer valid. Please enter a new HTTP Event Collector token.
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Splunk

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Splunk server
data_description.name: A name to identify this Home Assistant instance in Splunk events
data_description.port: The port number for the HTTP Event Collector (usually 8088)
data_description.ssl: Enable if your Splunk server uses HTTPS
data_description.token: The HEC token configured in your Splunk instance
data_description.verify_ssl: Verify the SSL certificate when connecting (recommended)

user.description:
Enter your Splunk HTTP Event Collector (HEC) connection details. You can find the token in your Splunk server under Settings > Data Inputs > HTTP Event Collector.

Entity filtering can be configured in YAML using the `filter` option.
user.title: Set up Splunk HTTP Event Collector

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.

While importing your configuration, a connection error occurred. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the connection settings from your `{domain}:` configuration and configure the integration via the UI.

Note: Entity filtering via YAML (`filter:`) will continue to work.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration is being removed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description:
Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.

While importing your configuration, the authentication token was rejected. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the connection settings from your `{domain}:` configuration and configure the integration via the UI.

Note: Entity filtering via YAML (`filter:`) will continue to work.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: [%key:component::splunk::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_connect::title%]

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.

While importing your configuration, an unexpected error occurred. Please check your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the connection settings from your `{domain}:` configuration and configure the integration via the UI.

Note: Entity filtering via YAML (`filter:`) will continue to work.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: [%key:component::splunk::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_connect::title%]
